text: The Danish PGA Championship is a golf tournament in the Nordic Golf League held in Denmark. From 1993 to 1997 it was an event on the Challenge Tour.Challenge Tour Winners, European Tour, accessed 6 September 2016 ==Winners== {|class=wikitable !Year!!Venue!!Winner!!Country!!Score |- !colspan=5|Jyske Bank PGA Championship |- | 2018 || Silkeborg || Jacob Glennemo || || 204 |- | 2017 || Silkeborg || Oskar Ambrosius (a) || || 203 |- | 2016 || Silkeborg || Rasmus Hjelm Nielsen || || 2042016 Jyske Bank PGA Championship -
